foreignData.name: Dämonischer Handel
foreignData.text: Schicke die obersten dreizehn Karten deiner Bibliothek ins Exil und durchsuche dann deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte. Nimm die Karte auf deine Hand und mische danach.

foreignData.name: Marché démoniaque
foreignData.text: Exilez les treize cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque, puis cherchez une carte dans votre bibliothèque. Mettez cette carte dans votre main, puis mélangez.

foreignData.name: 悪魔の取り引き
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード13枚を追放する。その後、あなたのライブラリーからカード１枚を探し、あなたの手札に加える。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。

name: Demonic Bargain
originalText: Exile the top thirteen cards of your library, then search your library for a card. Put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

rulings.text: The thirteen cards remain in exile. That's part of the bargain.
If there are any cards left in your library as you search, you must choose one of them.
You do not have to reveal the card you find. That's not part of the bargain.
If there are thirteen or fewer cards remaining in your library as this spell begins to resolve, you will exile your entire library. You won't put any cards into your hand.

text: Exile the top thirteen cards of your library, then search your library for a card. Put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
